name: Blue beret
description:
The game is a side-scrolling shoot-'em-up where the player takes control of an armed girl who must fight all sorts of enemies on the way. The player has 7 weapons and can kick enemies, collect coins, buy ammo and medical kits. The Game simulates real physics, and you can destroy environment on the stages to open blocked ways and hit your enemies with the pieces of the destructed objects. The game camera will be your main helper. It concentrates and on important events on the game round.
 
The protagonist can use special drugs to switch on a slow motion effect. You can customize your character by selecting the uniform color. You can also try to create your own levels and play them.
 
We used retro styled graphic and menu. The game tries to awake your nostalgia and seems so how the video games from the eighties seems us in our memories, but the modern gameplay with dynamic lights must hold your by the game from the start to the end.
 
Blue beret is released for smartphones to give you the ability to play everywhere but will be published for the desktop platforms later.
 
This video game is the first implementation of our new game engine -  "RPG Engine" (RPG = Retro Platformer Game) based on processing programming language. If you want to create levels using this engine you can see the learn video:
<a href="https://youtu.be/8tRa_MKCYQo">Level creating manual</a>
 
The game control is fully described in "HOW TO PLAY" submenu that you can find in "OPTIONS" menu. The short description is illustrated at the last screenshot.
   
Have a nice adventure!
